message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  Would you be willing to go down to $8,500?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $9,000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  I'm still hoping to get it a little closer to $8,500. Would you consider $8,750?  That's a fair price for both of us.
Bob, I understand you're still looking for a good deal. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $9,200.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  I'm still trying to make this work for my budget.  Would you consider $9,000? It's a fair price that would let us both walk away satisfied.
